solution_line_template: When Linda's mother gave her {mother_dimes} more dimes, the total number of dimes increased to {initial_dimes}+{mother_dimes} = <<{initial_dimes}+{mother_dimes}={total_dimes}>>{total_dimes} dimes.

She also increased the total number of quarters to {initial_quarters}+{mother_quarters} = <<{initial_quarters}+{mother_quarters}={total_quarters}>>{total_quarters} after her mother gave her {mother_quarters} more.
The total number of dimes and quarters she has is {total_quarters}+{total_dimes} = <<{total_quarters}+{total_dimes}={dimes_and_quarters}>>{dimes_and_quarters}
Linda's mother also gave her twice as many nickels as she has, a total of {multiplier_nickels}*{initial_nickels} = <<{multiplier_nickels}*{initial_nickels}={mother_nickels}>>{mother_nickels} nickels.
The total number of nickels she has increased to {mother_nickels}+{initial_nickels} = <<{mother_nickels}+{initial_nickels}={total_nickels}>>{total_nickels}
